attributes.action:
make young scot cards digital 
like a tap credit card or an app
attributes.additional_details: because ive seen a lot of people who have lost/damaged there card and there card does not work when on the bus this has happened to me but the bus driver lets me on .i think that making a petition could help other with young scots cards
attributes.background: i would like to make them digital kind of like a credit card you tap your phone on it. it would help if you lose/damage your card

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.  
 
The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:  

https://www.parliament.scot/chamber-and-committees/committees/current-and-previous-committees/session-6-citizen-participation-and-public-petitions-committee
